subtitle: This popular Cantonese dish can be made with any beef steak cut.

method.text: Mix together the sugar, soy sauce, sherry and cornflour. Add the beef and stir to coat. Leave to marinate for 30 min.
Heat the oil in a wok or large frying pan until smoking. Stir fry the beef for 30 sec or so until brown. Quickly remove with a slotted spoon. Set aside.
Add the vegetables to the pan. Stir fry for 2-3 min.
Return the beef to the pan with the oyster sauce. Stir fry for 1 min. Serve.

title: Beef in oyster sauce
